name: Nexus Shade
description:
Nexus Shade is a very short platformer game with some puzzle like levels. If you just want a quick thing to play give it a try. The game contains 12 full length levels and 2 hidden levels. No spoilers here! Once you've beaten the last level you are shown your Total Deaths, Time, and Score. Try your best to beat your past attempts and become the true Nexus Shade.

Feedback is very welcome this is one of my first games I'm releasing on here. So I would love advice on what I can improve on!
